meta.title: Corporate vehicle leasing solutions
meta.description: Optimize your fleet management with Movil Renta’s operational leasing system. Tailored solutions, tax benefits, and specialized service for companies across the country.

EmpresaPage.title: Operational leasing or long-term rental of vehicles and utility vehicles
EmpresaPage.subtitle: A system that will allow your company to obtain tax, financial, cost, and service level advantages.
EmpresaPage.description: We are the first car rental company created for businesses and formed by people who understand their specific needs. If you are thinking about renewing your fleet, entering into a temporary work contract, participating in a bidding process, forming a joint venture for a project, etc., feel free to contact us.

subItems.title: Better capital utilization, avoiding immobilization or freeing up credit capacity.
Offers significant tax benefits: monthly tax credit for the lease payment, reductions in assets, liabilities, and income tax payments.
Forget about paying: Registration, Insurance, Transfers, Maintenance, and Taxes.
Provides a fixed budget, avoiding confusing and scattered accounting expenses.
Simplifies cost calculations by eliminating unforeseen expenses: Backup fleet, etc.
No need for your own or third-party maintenance infrastructure.
Eliminates the need for administrative staff for fleet management.
No immobilized vehicles or the need to cover temporary demands.
Always have a fleet less than 12 months old, in line with your company’s image.
Immediate replacement of vehicles due to service, breakdowns, or accidents. Assistance available in major cities across the country through a network of rental agencies.

form.title: Request a quote
form.subtitle: Complete the following form to get a tailored solution based on your company’s specific needs.

meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Learn about Movil Renta’s history, values, and mission. Providing mobility solutions to businesses nationwide since 1971, with quality, commitment, and personalized service.

NosotrosPage.title: Our mission is to provide a satisfactory rental experience to our clients, offering convenient services for their needs.
NosotrosPage.subtitle: We started our activity in the industry back in 1971, positioning ourselves among the pioneers at the national level. Our experience has allowed us to understand our clients' needs and deliver a service with superior safety and quality.
NosotrosPage.description: When we talk about levels of safety and quality, we refer to:

listDescription.title: Service:
listDescription.content: Specialized attention from our staff, immediate vehicle replacement in case of damage or service needs. We offer NACIÓN SEGUROS 24/7 mechanical emergency service.

listDescription.title: Maintenance:
listDescription.content: Handled by us, with scheduled preventive services.

listDescription.title: Insurance:
listDescription.content: Contracted through Nación Seguros insurance company.

listDescription.title: Documentation:
listDescription.content: We deliver vehicles with all necessary documents in order, avoiding potential delays at road checkpoints.

listItem.content: We will treat everyone we work with respectfully and kindly.
We will fulfill all our commitments with our clients and employees.
We will communicate openly and honestly to earn the trust of our clients.
We will maintain a work environment based on fellowship and solidarity.
We will communicate with respect and trust to work effectively.
We constantly strive to give our best so that our clients enjoy their experience with us.
We are committed to providing effective and convenient service, as we have extensive experience in the field.
Easy, fast, safe, and affordable (best price guaranteed).

We are committed to maintaining our vehicle fleet. We constantly renew it to always have new cars available for our clients. We also continuously train and motivate our team so they can grow and achieve their professional and personal goals.

meta.title: Terms and Conditions
meta.description: Please read the terms and conditions carefully before hiring our vehicle rental services.

subItems.title: Maintenance
Vehicle replacement in case of breakdown or accident:
Immediate replacement at our office
Within 24 hours outside our office
Replacement vehicles may have the same or similar characteristics as the originally rented one.
Civil liability insurance for transported and/or non-transported third parties, property and/or persons up to ARS $80,000,000.
24-hour mechanical, health assistance, and towing service.
Fuel
Traffic fines
Overages
Tolls
Drop-off charges
Franchise fees for shortages, damages, theft and/or rollover of the vehicle.

termsAndConditions.title: Franchise reduction:
termsAndConditions.content: The customer may reduce their franchise responsibility by paying an additional insurance fee. To reduce the franchise for monthly rentals, the customer must pay the equivalent of 18 days of additional insurance according to the assigned vehicle category. The customer is solely responsible for any damage caused by misuse, negligence, or failure to observe the vehicle’s preventive mechanisms (audible or light signals), river crossings, and/or driving on dirt, gravel, sand, or other unpaved roads, even if the cost exceeds the franchise. Movil Renta is exempt from any responsibility for delays, losses, costs, or vehicle replacement due to these causes. This coverage includes any damage or infringement caused by anyone using the vehicle during the rental period.

subItems.title: Drivers must be over 25 years old, have a valid driver’s license and up-to-date identification.
To pick up a vehicle, a credit card must be presented (Visa, American Express, Diners, Mastercard, etc.).

termsAndConditions.title: Fuel shortage:
termsAndConditions.content: Movil Renta will charge a service fee if the vehicle is not returned with the same amount of fuel as delivered.

termsAndConditions.title: Vehicle return:
termsAndConditions.content: The customer assumes responsibility for the content and charges detailed in the return document when the vehicle is returned outside of business hours, or during business hours without waiting for that document and vehicle inspection.

termsAndConditions.title: Confirmed reservation cancellation notice:
termsAndConditions.content: If the customer needs to cancel a confirmed reservation, it is important to notify Movil Renta as far in advance as possible.

termsAndConditions.title: Airport fee:
termsAndConditions.content: Rentals taken at airports will NOT have an additional airport fee.

meta.title: Safety Tips
meta.description: Essential recommendations for responsible and safe driving during vehicle use.

subItems.title: Before setting off, adjust the driver’s seat and rear-view mirrors to achieve the ideal driving position.
All vehicle occupants must wear seat belts.
Children under 10 years old must be seated in the rear seats with seat belts fastened.
Children over 1 year old, until their weight and height allow otherwise, must use child safety seats. Always in the rear seat.
Children under 1 year must be placed in rear-facing child safety seats, in the back seat of the vehicle.
DO NOT use a cell phone while driving.
Signal all maneuvers using turn signals.
Keep to the right lane.
Observe and respect road signs.

Do not drive after consuming alcohol. Even one glass or a beer is enough to impair reaction time, perception, and create a false sense of security. Remember that Tucumán has adopted Law No. 6.082 of 'zero' tolerance.

Respect speed limits. Excessive speed, especially combined with alcohol consumption, is a factor in most serious accidents, even if seat belts are properly used. It's important to moderate your speed.
Gradually reduce speed when visibility decreases due to fog or smoke.
Use the vehicle’s hazard lights only when stopping or during roadside stops. Do not stop abruptly on the road or shoulder.

Distractions while driving are another major cause of accidents. At a speed of 80 km/h, a 2-second distraction means driving 44.4 meters without paying attention to the road, during which anything can happen.

GraciasPage.subtitle: Thank you for choosing us. We’ve sent your booking code to the email address you provided.
